testsuite.name: oradb::installdb CentOS remote oradb install database

testcase.name: oradb::installdb CentOS remote oradb install database should contain Exec[install oracle database 12.1.0.1_Linux-x86-64] with command => "/bin/sh -c 'unset DISPLAY;/install/linuxamd64_12c_database/database/runInstaller -silent -waitforcompletion -ignoreSysPrereqs -ignorePrereq -responseFile /install/db_install_12.1.0.1.rsp'", creates => "/oracle/product/12.1/db/dbs" and group => "oinstall"
